parameters.name: BasicRules
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable basic protection. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: CtiRules
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable threat intelligence. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default)
*   **en**

parameters.name: MaxSdl
parameters.description: The maximum amount of traffic that can be processed by the sensitive data leak detection feature each day.

parameters.name: PatchRules
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable virtual patching. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: RuleClass
parameters.description:
The level of the rule group for the IPS. Valid values:

*   **1**: loose
*   **2**: medium
*   **3**: strict

parameters.name: RunMode
parameters.description:
The mode of the IPS. Valid values:

*   **1**: block mode
*   **0**: monitor mode
